You (`PersonName-1@schedule`) had an appointment with `DoctorName-1@schedule` the other day. Unfortunately, you forgot to write down the instructions the doctor gave you. Please followup and find out how often to take your medicine.
linear_guide: In this dialogue, either act confused, like a person with memory problems, or act concerned about the effects of the medicine.
Oh, `DoctorName-1@schedule` was actually your previous doctor. Your new doctor is `DoctorName-2@schedule` now. That's the one you had the appointment with.
Say something random about your doctors, your condition, or about something (imagined) that happened to you today. Then bring the conversation to a natural close.
